body_html:
Should be good now.

The module tests compares forward/backward of cpu double vs cuda float. When the value of the output (or gradInput) is too large (> 100) because of the input, target, and weights, this results in a precision error of > 2e-4 for some random initializations. To fix it, I reduced the size of the random input/weight in the test.

Should be good now.

The module tests compares forward/backward of cpu double vs cuda float.
